roleset.name: make a payment

example.name: arg 1 with purpose
example.text: Remuneration for use rights directors for the re-use of their work was equitable.
example.arg: for the re-use of their work

roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to remunerate.01. Remunerate.01 is a member of Vn class judgement-33. Framed by Katie
